sentences.en: A bugle call came round for us to fall in.
sentences.cn: 军号声传来,要我们排队集合.

sentences.en: A loud bugle aroused everyone from sleep.
sentences.cn: 嘹亮的号声将每个人从睡梦中唤醒.

sentences.en: Around 4 a.m. , I heard a bugle in the valley below. We were about to be attacked. But I could not call in fire because we had no idea where friendly or enemy troops were.
sentences.cn: 凌晨4点左右，我听到了下面山谷传来号角声， 敌人很快就要攻击我们了， 但我无法呼唤炮火，因为我们不知道敌军和友军的具体位置。

sentences.en: Each blows his own bugle and sings his own tune -- each does things in his own way.
sentences.cn: 各吹各的号,各唱各的调.

sentences.en: He blew two or three loud notes on his bugle.
He roused up from sleep when the bugle sounded.
sentences.cn: 号声响时,他从睡梦中惊醒.

sentences.en: I bought lollipops and a toot - toot bugle. I started for home.
sentences.cn: 我给她买了棒棒糖,一吹就呜的打响的小喇叭. 我就往回走.

sentences.en: I had been seeing myself on stage, with a war bugle blowing and bullets whizzing by and here I was, a soldier crouching in his trench and ready for a bayonet charge, to take my fate by its throat.
sentences.cn: 我曾觉得自己是这样的，当军号响起，子弹就在耳旁飞过，而我就在那里，一个士兵蜷伏在战壕中并准备用刺刀冲锋，来掌握我的命运之喉。

sentences.en: I want a trumpet, two tubas and a bugle.
sentences.cn: 我要一把小号, 两把大号和一把号角.

sentences.en: The bugle blasted forth in the distance.
The bugle sounded as the troops advanced.
The soldiers sprang up when they heard the bugle.
sentences.cn: 战士们听到号声一跃而起.

sentences.en: The wind is trumpeting , a bugle calling to charge!
This paper gives a brief introduction to the time simulated - bugle broadcaster.
sentences.cn: 介绍了定时播送模拟军号的单片机系统.

sentences.en: What will you trade for the bugle?
sentences.cn: 你要我用什么东西来换你的喇叭?

sentences.en: When he heard the bugle call, he caught up his gun and dashed out.
sentences.cn: 他一听到军号声就抓起枪冲了出去.

words.tran_cn: 喇叭；军号；筋骨草属植物

trans.tran_cn: 号角，喇叭，筋骨草属植物，（装饰女服的）柱状玻璃小珠
trans.tran_en: a musical instrument like a trumpet, that is used in the army to call soldiers
to play or sound (on) a bugle
